text: As countries begin rolling out #Covid19 #Vaccine programmes worldwide, research by Nikhil Vellodi (@PSEinfo) & Joshua Weiss (@IIES_Sthlm @Stockholm_Uni) analyses optimum policies and suggest where to prioritise vaccine allocation. In Issue 65 #CovidEcon: https://t.co/bLHMoGwW6U https://t.co/gU75fljZ9y
